email.reminder-new.herd-pl: But I have managed to become friends with you. I don't think you're ready to give up your freedom and safety online, either.
email.reminder-new.herd-es: Pero he conseguido hacerme amigo tuyo. Tampoco creo que estés preparado para renunciar a tu libertad y seguridad en Internet.
email.reminder-new.herd-de: Aber ich habe es geschafft, mich mit Ihnen anzufreunden. Ich glaube auch nicht, dass Sie bereit sind, Ihre Freiheit und Sicherheit im Internet aufzugeben.
email.reminder-new.herd-zh: 但我已设法与你成为朋友。我认为你也没有准备好放弃网上的自由和安全。
email.reminder-new.herd-tr: Ama seninle arkadaş olmayı başardım. İnternette özgürlüğünden ve güvenliğinden de vazgeçmeye hazır olduğunu sanmıyorum.
email.reminder-new.herd-nl: But I have managed to become friends with you. I don't think you're ready to give up your freedom and safety online, either.
email.reminder-new.herd-fr: Mais j'ai réussi à devenir ami avec vous. Je ne pense pas que tu sois prêt à abandonner ta liberté et ta sécurité en ligne, non plus.
email.reminder-new.herd-ru: Но я успел подружится с Вами. Думаю, и Вы не готовы расстаться со своей свободой и безопасностью в сети.
email.reminder-new.herd-jp: But I have managed to become friends with you. I don't think you're ready to give up your freedom and safety online, either.
email.reminder-new.herd-cz: But I have managed to become friends with you. I don't think you're ready to give up your freedom and safety online, either.
email.reminder-new.herd-it: Ma sono riuscito a diventare tuo amico. Non penso che tu sia pronto nemmeno a rinunciare alla tua libertà e sicurezza online.
email.reminder-new.herd-pt: But I have managed to become friends with you. I don't think you're ready to give up your freedom and safety online, either.
email.reminder-new.herd-en: But I have managed to become friends with you. I don't think you're ready to give up your freedom and safety online, either.
email.reminder-new.herd-discount-pl: As a thank you for choosing our service, I give you a personal 10% discount on any tariff plan.
